meanings.definition: A type of Jewish dumpling filled with meat or potatoes.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother made delicious kreplech for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The kreplech at the restaurant was flavorful and satisfying.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped a kreplech on the floor, and my dog thought it was a treat!
meanings.sent4: The kreplech was like a little surprise package of tasty goodness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the kreplech cooking filled the kitchen with warmth and comfort.

meanings.definition: To fill with a savory filling, typically meat or potatoes.
meanings.sent1: She carefully krepleched the dough with seasoned meat.
meanings.sent2: The chef krepleched the pastry with a rich potato mixture.
meanings.sent3: I kreplech my sandwich with all my favorite toppings.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter krepleched the room with joy and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The music krepleched my heart with nostalgia and longing.
